remarks: Lemma for ~ ipassi .  Show the inner product associative law for all complex numbers.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ip1i.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.

ip1i.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.

ipasslem11.a $e |- A e. X $.

ipasslem11 $p |- ( C e. CC -> ( ( C S A ) P B ) = ( C x. ( A P B ) ) ) $.
